results.text: This spill hurt more than just your pride. The next time you are knocked prone, it costs all of your movement to stand up—and you’re sure you bruised your tailbone(s).
It may look cool, but it’s really bad for your knees. You take an additional amount of fall damage equal to twice your proficiency bonus.
Even your extensive energy reserves have run out. You gain one level of Fatigue.
Your acrobatic antics have put you in a bad spot. For the next hour, your movement speed is reduced by 10 feet.
You’re having an off day and your body is feeling it. You have disadvantage on your next Acrobatics check.

You overestimated your ability to squeeze through this passage and now you’re wedged in place. You must either spend your next action to wriggle loose or you must have an ally assist you out of this predicament.
